review: Experience was good. I will recommend the doctor to my family and friends. He is good, he is nice and strong. He listens to all the problems of patients. For the hospital I would like to suggest, the nursing is very poor actually I was admitted for dengue for 3 days at that time the nursing was very poor. I met Dr. Hemachand Balla only once for my 2 years kid, whatever the suggestion he gave it was fine, it helped him a lot with the medicines he gave. He understands the patient's conditions and patient's pain and gives the right recommendation.

Doctor was very friendly. Spent good amount of time to discuss the problem that i am facing (cervical spondylitis). Explained everything in detailed and the best options. Infact doctor corrected the MRI report impression. The last best thing is friendliness.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr.Hemachanda Balla for my mothers shoulder pain.He spoke to us nicely and advised us for an x-ray of the shoulder.Later on he advised us medication and gave us all the required information for further treatment.He is friendly with the patients and makes them feel comfortable.I will definitely recommend him to my relatives and friends.

I had consulted the doctor as I had mild rib bone fracture. ****** *** ***** Medicines was prescribed by the doctor. Physiotherapy was suggested by the doctor. Scanning was done. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend the doctor to my family or friends. Waiting time was manageable and scheduled properly. I am fine now.

I had visited the hospital as I had back pain issue. *** ****** *** ***** Even he treated my mother long back. Physiotherapy was suggested. Medicines was prescribed by the doctor. X-ray was done. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I was able to recover later. I have already recommended doctor to my family or friends. I am fine now. Waiting time is manageable.
**** ****** * went for a very minor fracture which had low impact for my daughter . Long waiting time .

review: He is very nice. He explains detailed causes of the problems. Suggest investigations only if necessary.
